title: Looking for a PC equivalent for DIN fonts used in a Mac file
content:
I need to know the compatible font for PC that was used in a Mac file.  
DIN Bold Alternate & DIN Gothic Light.
author: volarie-ann

comments.content:
You can get DIN at [FontShop.](http://web.archive.org/web/20100302224405/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=din&site=d&btnG=Go)

- Lex

"DIN Bold Alternate" sounds like [FF DIN Bold Alternate](http://web.archive.org/web/20100302224405/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_din_bd_bd_exp_bd_alt/), but I've never heard of "DIN Gothic". Perhaps [FF DIN Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20100302224405/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_din_lt_lt_exp_lt_alt/)?
